info: The project will promote regional connectivity with neighboring countries through the investment in the road construction and land ports with custom stations, facilitating cross border trade. The project will also improve the national road network in Bhutan to remote areas in the eastern part of Bhutan near Indian border providing better access to economic opportunities and social services. These facilitate efficient and safe transportation of goods within Bhutan and with neighboring countries.
name: SOUTH ASIA SUBREGIONAL ECONOMIC COOPERATION ROAD CONNECTIVITY PROJECT
